title: Cripple, Blind Man and Old Beggar Woman (Lahmer, Blinder und bettelnde Alte (in-text plate, page 9) from Der Kopf (The Head)
medium: Line-block reproduction after woodcut from an illustrated book with nine line-block reproductions after woodcuts, one line-block reproduction after woodcut title vignette, and one line-block reproduction (duplicate of title vignette) on front cover
